How come the contrib version has update_collections, but the one under tf.layers does not have it?

I think the Note section in the documentation of tf.layers.batch_normalization should at least be promoted to a Warning. So far when I followed all the official tutorials, it was okay to just skim through or ignore the Note sections but this really is not the case here.

body:
How come the contrib version has `update_collections`, but the one under `tf.layers` does not have it?

I think the Note section in the documentation of [tf.layers.batch_normalization](https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/tf/layers/batch_normalization) should at least be promoted to a Warning. So far when I followed all the official tutorials, it was okay to just skim through or ignore the Note sections but this really is not the case here.
